price: 84. Le dimos poder sobre la tierra y le concedimos los medios necesarios (poder y conocimiento) para todo.
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
